snippet.title: Chroma Shift Story Trailer
snippet.description:
"The world is broken. Chaos and fear swept nations as they turned against one another. As the arms race accelerates, they developed robotics facilities in order to develop powerful and sophisticated armies of machines. However, things go wrong as an unseen force subverts those armies and turns their own creations against them. Sundering any chance of peace for mankind."

Chroma Shift is a co-op puzzle platformer game where the player must help the two reactivated droids Psi and Theta work together and explore the robotics facility.

Chroma Shift is set for release on PC in January 2018.

Follow us on our website and social media to keep up to date with our progress!

Website: http://www.devordiestudios.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/devordiestudios/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/DevOrDieStudios
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/devordiestudios/
